Name: CVE-2013-4091
Description: The SecureSphere Operations Manager (SOM) Management Server in Imperva SecureSphere 9.0.0.5 does not have an off autocomplete attribute for the password (aka j_password) field on the secsphLogin.jsp login page, which makes it easier for remote attackers to obtain access by leveraging an unattended workstation.

Name: CVE-2013-4092
Description: The SecureSphere Operations Manager (SOM) Management Server in Imperva SecureSphere 9.0.0.5 allows context-dependent attackers to obtain sensitive information by leveraging the presence of (1) a session ID in the jsessionid field to secsphLogin.jsp or (2) credentials in the j_password parameter to j_acegi_security_check, and reading (a) web-server access logs, (b) web-server Referer logs, or (c) the browser history.

Name: CVE-2013-4093
Description: The SecureSphere Operations Manager (SOM) Management Server in Imperva SecureSphere 9.0.0.5 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via (1) a direct request to dwr/call/plaincall/AsyncOperationsContainer.getOperationState.dwr, which reveals the installation path in the s0.filePath field, or (2) a T/keyManagement request to plain/settings.html, which reveals a temporary path in an error message.

Name: CVE-2013-4094
Description: The Key Management feature in the SecureSphere Operations Manager (SOM) Management Server in Imperva SecureSphere 9.0.0.5 allows remote authenticated users to upload executable files via the (1) private_key or (2) public_key parameter in a T/keyManagement request to plain/settings.html, as demonstrated by uploading a Linux ELF file and a shell script.

Name: CVE-2013-4095
Description: plain/actionsets.html in the SecureSphere Operations Manager (SOM) Management Server in Imperva SecureSphere 9.0.0.5 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via a task with a [command].value field in conjunction with an [arguments].value field.

Name: CVE-2013-4096
Description: ServerAdmin/TestTelnetConnection.jsp in DS3 Authentication Server allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary commands via shell metacharacters in the HOST_NAME field.

Name: CVE-2013-4097
Description: ServerAdmin/TestDRConnection.jsp in DS3 Authentication Server allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via a direct request, which reveals the installation path in a -REG-E-OPEN error message.

Name: CVE-2013-4098

Name: CVE-2013-4129
Description: The bridge multicast implementation in the Linux kernel through 3.10.3 does not check whether a certain timer is armed before modifying the timeout value of that timer, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (BUG and system crash) via vectors involving the shutdown of a KVM virtual machine, related to net/bridge/br_mdb.c and net/bridge/br_multicast.c.

Name: CVE-2013-4131
Description: The mod_dav_svn Apache HTTPD server module in Subversion 1.7.0 through 1.7.10 and 1.8.x before 1.8.1 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (assertion failure or out-of-bounds read) via a certain (1) COPY, (2) DELETE, or (3) MOVE request against a revision root.
